name: getAttachmentMeta
description:
Returns the attachment settings, that is, whether attachments are enabled and the maximum attachment size allowed.

Note that there are also [project permissions](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) that restrict whether users can create and delete attachments.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** None.

$block: Details of the instance's attachment settings.

$ul: **enabled**: Whether the ability to add attachments is enabled.
**uploadLimit**: The maximum size of attachments permitted, in bytes.
